tool_description: Check ballance, send, invoice satoshi via Cryptoo.me
name: Cryptoo.me off-chain bitcoin transactions
title: Cryptoo.me off-chain bitcoin transactions

api_list.name: balance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptoo-me-off-chain-bitcoin-transactions.p.rapidapi.com/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptoo-me-off-chain-bitcoin-transactions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
